text: KHWR-LP (92.7 FM) is a low-power FM radio station licensed to McAlester, Oklahoma, United States. The station is currently owned by Flames Of Truth Crusades. ==History== The station was assigned the call sign KHWR on February 17, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * HWR-LP HWR-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in Oklahoma
title: KHWR-LP
